verses.name: Isaiah 64:6
verses.text: But we are all as an unclean thing, and all our righteousnesses are as filthy rags; and we all do fade as a leaf; and our iniquities, like the wind, have taken us away.

verses.name: Isaiah 64:7
verses.text: And there is none that calleth upon thy name, that stirreth up himself to take hold of thee: for thou hast hid thy face from us, and hast consumed us, because of our iniquities.

verses.name: Isaiah 64:8
verses.text: But now, O Lord, thou art our father; we are the clay, and thou our potter; and we all are the work of thy hand.
